title: LF Duo Silver - Gold
body:
ID:Dizzyui

Was G3 in last season, now stuck in silver....

I main mid and win 80% of my lanes.
I can also play top, JG and Sup.
I figure our team lost most of the game due to squishy team.
Therefore, i am looking for a duo mains in TANKY top or Jg that knows how to peel and cc in team fight.
Please add me in game and climb together.

replies.body: i used to play with you, funny how ur still silver.
Hey I play teemo support and I sit invis at mid for 10 minutes to get you kill. Add me and ill carry you.
hey i play tank jg's (pref rammus and cho) but i can also go top lane tanks like shen and poppy add me if u want to play with me i added ur account :)
